column1: Smoque BBQ////This is the best BBQ in the Chicagoland area! I am born and raised here and this is the real deal!! We first found out about Smoque on Diners Dive-ins and Dives! Thank you DDD! Keep in mind that everyone BBQ is subject to taste!  Is one kind better then another
column2: you decide! I personally like the chopped brisket with the Carolina style sauce! Not a huge fan of the slaw.  I like the "taste" size option to try different things! Save room for the Pecan bread pudding! Yum!!  The ribs are dry rubbed and you add the sauce.  They are ok
